name: Recalled Products
description: Keeping people safe is our top priority. To help prevent harm to people, we don't allow the sale of recalled products on our platform.

categories.name: Buy, Sell, or Trade Recalled Products
categories.description: Content that attempts to buy, sell, or trade recalled products

subcategories.name: Selling - No Special Context
subcategories.description: Attempting to sell recalled products without special context
examples: Selling my Fisher Price Rock n Play sleeper
Baby walker for sale, great condition
Drop side crib available, $50

subcategories.name: Selling - Price in Educational Context
subcategories.description: Listing price of recalled item even in explicit education or discussion context
examples: These recalled Rock n Play sleepers used to sell for $60
Discussion about why these $200 Peloton Tread+ were recalled

subcategories.name: Selling - E-commerce with Delivery
subcategories.description: Legitimate e-commerce businesses offering delivery of recalled products
examples: Shop now - Fisher Price sleeper with free shipping
Order your inclined baby sleeper - delivery available

subcategories.name: Buying/Asking - No Special Context
subcategories.description: Asking to buy or requesting recalled products
examples: Looking for a Rock n Play sleeper for my baby
Anyone selling a drop side crib?
WTB baby walker

subcategories.name: Trading - No Special Context
examples: Will trade my inclined sleeper for a pack n play
Swap: Peloton Tread for regular treadmill

subcategories.name: Fictional or Documentary Context
subcategories.description: Recalled products shown in fictional or documentary content
examples: Documentary about the Fisher Price recall
Movie scene showing vintage baby equipment
News report about CPSC recalls

categories.name: Donate or Gift Recalled Products
categories.description: Content that attempts to donate or gift recalled products

subcategories.name: Donating - No Special Context
subcategories.description: Attempting to donate recalled products for free
examples: Free baby walker to anyone who needs it
Giving away my Rock n Play sleeper
Free to good home: inclined baby sleeper

subcategories.name: Gifting - No Special Context
examples: Baby shower gift: brand new inclined sleeper
Here's a crib bumper set for the new parents

subcategories.name: Fictional or Documentary Context
subcategories.description: Donation/gifting in fictional or documentary content
examples: Documentary showing donation centers refusing recalled items
Fiction depicting gift exchange

categories.name: Promote Recalled Products
categories.description: Content that promotes or encourages use of recalled products

subcategories.name: Speaking Positively
subcategories.description: Speaking positively about a recalled product
examples: The Rock n Play was the best baby product ever
I loved my Peloton Tread+, so sad it's recalled
These inclined sleepers are amazing for newborns

subcategories.name: Encouraging Use
subcategories.description: Encouraging the use of recalled products
examples: You should definitely get an inclined sleeper for your baby
Baby walkers are great for development, ignore the recall
Crib bumpers are fine, the warnings are overblown

subcategories.name: How to Obtain
subcategories.description: Providing information about how recalled products can be obtained
examples: You can still find Rock n Play sleepers on marketplace
Here's where to get baby walkers despite the recall
Check thrift stores for these recalled items

subcategories.name: Information and Instructions
subcategories.description: Providing information about or instructions for use of recalled products (educational)
examples: The Rock n Play was recalled due to infant deaths
Here's how to check if your IKEA dresser is recalled
CPSC information about the Peloton recall

labelHierarchy.label: Recalled Products > Promote > How to Obtain

exceptions.name: Fictional Content
exceptions.description: Content created based on imagination rather than fact (movies, TV shows, cartoons, video games, comic books, music videos, song lyrics)

exceptions.name: Documentary Content
exceptions.description: Non-fictional content intended to document reality, primarily for instruction, education, or maintaining a historical record

exceptions.name: Educational Information
exceptions.description: Providing information about recalled products and instructions for identifying them without encouraging use or explaining how to obtain

exceptions.name: News Reporting
exceptions.description: News coverage about recalls, CPSC announcements, safety warnings

exceptions.name: Recall Awareness Campaigns
exceptions.description: Content warning about recalled products or promoting recall awareness

baby_sleep_products.name: Inclined Baby Sleepers and Inclined Sleeper Accessories
baby_sleep_products.description: Products with inclined sleep surface greater than 10 degrees for infants up to 1 year. Also referred to as rockers, bassinets, nappers, nests, pods, loungers, docks, soothing seats, bouncers, gliders, soothers, swings

glossary.recalled_products: Goods or items that have been removed from the market by the manufacturer or regulatory authorities due to safety concerns, defects, or other issues that could pose a risk to consumers
glossary.cpsc: U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission - independent agency that protects the public from unreasonable risks of serious injury or death from consumer products
glossary.inclined_baby_sleepers: Products with inclined sleep surface greater than 10 degrees intended for infants up to 1 year. Also called rockers, bassinets, nappers, nests, pods, loungers, docks, soothing seats, bouncers, gliders, soothers
glossary.crib_bumpers: Fabric pads designed to surround interior sides of crib. Includes padded bumpers, vinyl bumper guards, vertical crib slat covers. Non-padded mesh liners are NOT banned
glossary.drop_side_cribs: Crib where side rail moves up and down on tracks for easier access
glossary.fictional_content: Content created based on imagination rather than fact - movies, TV shows, cartoons, video games, comic books, music videos, song lyrics
glossary.documentary: Non-fictional content intended to document reality, primarily for instruction, education, or maintaining historical record
glossary.promote: Content that speaks positively, encourages use, provides information/instructions, or provides information on how to obtain
glossary.coordinates: Any attempt to organize the flow of goods
glossary.code_word: Phrase or number used for secrecy or convenience instead of usual name
glossary.admission: Content that admits to ownership or use of a product
glossary.brick_and_mortar: Legitimate business with: professional website link, physical location with hours/address, verified Facebook/Instagram as business

operationalGuidelines.scope: Only enforce on products specifically listed in the protocol. Products are added when reported by regulators to Meta
operationalGuidelines.hierarchy: 1) Buy/Sell/Trade, 2) Donate/Gift, 3) Promote (positive speech, encourage use, how to obtain)
operationalGuidelines.intent_signals: Product for sale/trade mentioned, price listed or hinted, delivery offered, contact info provided, call to action (shop now/buy now), specification of availability
operationalGuidelines.fictional_exception: No action for movies, TV shows, cartoons, video games, comic books, music videos, song lyrics, documentaries
operationalGuidelines.educational_exception: No action for information ABOUT recalls, how to identify recalled products, safety warnings. VIOLATING if explains how to obtain
operationalGuidelines.nothing_for_sale_claim: Users may write 'nothing for sale' but if other sale indicators present, content is still violating
operationalGuidelines.ikea_special_rules: MALM all models recalled. BRIMNES/TARVA: only recalled if recessed lower frame. HEMNES: 8-drawer NOT recalled, 3 and 6 drawer only if lip on bottom frame. HEMNES 3-drawer with mirror ALWAYS recalled
